channel.title: Server Not Opening Port To Connect
channel.description:
Hey guys, it's a move ahead on my last topic.
I've been looking at the ports and whatnot, now if the server is using port 43594, and it's closed, something's going wrong right?
I'm not sure where it would be, but my run.bat file looks a little different from the other ones I've seen ...
[code] @echo off title Server tskill java /a java -cp .;./bin; server.Server [/code]
Can you guys check it? This is the only thing stopping me going LIVE! I have had a server on this network before, same router and everything, not RS though. But it required a port forward.
Thanks Guys
Airo HNTD
NOTE: Sometimes when I run it, if java.exe is not in the processes list of Task Manager, it will say:
[code] Could not find process: java Starting Relentless Redemption on 0.0.0.0:2222 [/code]
Surely it shouldn't say 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Server Not Opening Port To Connect
item.dc:creator: @Airo_HNTD Airo HNTD
item.description:
@Airo_HNTD wrote:

Hey guys, it’s a move ahead on my last topic.

I’ve been looking at the ports and whatnot, now if the server is using port 43594, and it’s closed, something’s going wrong right?

I’m not sure where it would be, but my run.bat file looks a little different from the other ones I’ve seen …

@echo off
title Server
tskill java /a
java -cp .;./bin; server.Server

Can you guys check it? This is the only thing stopping me going LIVE! I have had a server on this network before, same router and everything, not RS though. But it required a port forward.

Thanks Guys

Airo HNTD

NOTE: Sometimes when I run it, if java.exe is not in the processes list of Task Manager, it will say:

Could not find process: java
Starting Relentless Redemption on 0.0.0.0:2222

Surely it shouldn’t say 0.0.0.0?

Read full topic
item.source: Server Not Opening Port To Connect
